property.name: value
property.label: Value
property.description: The HTML content in the rich text editor.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: The label of the rich text editor.

property.name: fieldLevelHelp
property.label: Help Text
property.description: The help text that appears in a popover.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: If present, the textarea field must be filled out before the form can be submitted.

property.name: readOnly
property.label: Read Only
property.description: If present, the textarea field is read-only and cannot be edited.

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: If present, the textarea field is disabled and users cannot interact with it.

property.name: labelVisible
property.label: Label Visible
property.description: If present, the label on the rich text editor is visible.

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Placeholder
property.description: Text that is displayed when the field is empty, to prompt the user for a valid entry.

property.name: maxCharacterCountMessage
property.label: Max Character Count Message
property.description: Maximum number of characters allowed error message

property.name: maxWordCountMessage
property.label: Max Word Count Message
property.description: Maximum number of words allowed error message

property.name: formats
property.label: Formats
property.description: A list of allowed formats. By default, the list is computed based on enabled categories. The 'table' format is always enabled to support copying and pasting of tables if formats are not provided.

property.name: displayCharacterCount
property.label: Display Character Count
property.description: Confirm that you want to apply and display the character count on page

property.name: displayWordCount
property.label: Display Word Count
property.description: Confirm that you want to apply and display the word count on page

property.name: requireFieldMessage
property.label: Required field message
property.description: Provide a message when a field is required but not completed
